overview: The little white rabbit played hide-and-seek with her mother when she was pulling out radishes. The mother was worried that it would meet a wolf and asked it not to run around and go home quickly. The little white rabbit waved his hands after hearing this, "I know, I know", the mother asked It looks like a wolf, with "small eyes, big mouth, pointed teeth and long tail". The song was sung well, but the little white rabbit actually didn't know what the wolf looked like.
title: I Know
